runs.comm: starts with a wide down the leg side
swing for Langeveldt, beats McCullum's outside edge as he looks to drive
McCullum jumps  away from leg and cracks the ball to cover, placement is poor
skips away to leg again, gets this one away towards square leg for the first runs off the bat
a trademark McCullum boundary, for the third time in a row he dances down the track and away from leg, short of length delivery is smoked over covers for four

that's the end of McCullum though, yet again he moves to leg and looks to hit over off, punches it flat, Gibbs pulls off a spectacular catch at cover to send him back, he dived to his right to pluck a one-handed low catch
did that fall short of Botha at backward point? Langeveldt got the outside edge with a shortish ball just outside off, and he was thinking he had got his second wicket of the over
Ryder plays Steyn's first ball towards point
short of length and on the pads, cramping Ryder up, he defends towards the bowler
a touch fuller this time, outside off, Ryder looks to flat bat it down the ground, gets a bottom edge towards gully
jagging away this time to take the outside edge, ball flies towards backward point
back of length again, just outside off, Ryder chops it towards point but straight at the fielder
length ball just outside leg, Ryder back away and jabs the ball towards backward point for a single
tipped to short cover for a single
another outside edge for Guptill, lands away from third man though
short of length and outside off, Ryder muscles that one over midwicket, plenty of power behind that stroke
tries to clip it past fine leg, but gets an edge onto the body and towards third man
Guptill brings out his favourite shot, the pull, it was a short ball, Guptill powers that in front of square leg for four
down the leg side to give away a free run, just the over New Zealand wanted after the loss of McCullum
just outside off, guided towards third man for a single by Guptill
full and on the pads, Guptill looks to get that away behind square leg, but misses and the ball rolls onto the pitch after hitting the pad
a quick delivery in the channel outside off, Guptill tries to steer to third man but misses
two in a row, this delivery was slight shorter but the same line, again Guptil makes room to get it away to third man, but fails to connect
third time lucky, this time instead of the dab he goes for a more powerful cut after making room, the ball races away to the backward point boundary
once more, a touch slower from Steyn, and wider, Guptill moves to leg and carves it over backward point for four more
Guptill completes an over of backing away by trying to cut the final delivery, gets a bottom edge and the ball goes nowhere
Ryder thumps a length ball from Morne towards sweeper cover this time
shorter and on middle stump, Ryder looks to pull that but misses

Ryder nearly a goner there, Steyn didn't sight the ball at third man after a flail from Ryder sails towards the fielder, Steyn finally sees the ball and lunges forward, collects the ball after it bounces inches in front of him, immediately signals that it was not out
defended to covers by Guptill
shortish and well outside off, Guptill looks to slap over point again, but doesn't connect
back of a length and angling into legstump, Guptill doesn't have the room he's looking for, he jabs the ball back towards the bowler to end a tidy over from Morne
Ryder backs away and slices Kallis' first ball towards third man
short of length and on offstump, Ryder tries to power it down the ground, can't beat the man at mid-on
'waiting' is the call after Ryder makes room and taps it towards point, Kallis bowling from round the wicket to deny him room
short ball outside off, Ryder tries to uppercut it towards deep backward point, but misses it
Ryder continues to dance away from leg, Kallis continues to spear the ball into the batsman, Ryder guides it down to third man
length ball angling down leg, Guptill skips away towards the leg side, he is beaten and the ball slips through to the keeper between the stumps and the batsman
Ryder clears the front leg to try slam it to midwicket, he mistimes it towards mid-on
into the pavilion from Ryder, Morne tries the slower ball, Ryder moves away from the stumps and effortlessly hits it over long-off for six
short on legstump, Ryder helps it towards short fine
length ball in the channel outside off, Guptill chops it towards point
innovative from Ryder, shortish ball outside leg, Ryder had backed away enough to dink it towards third man
no timing for Guptill as he clubs a shortish ball on middle towards long-on for a single
first ball from Botha turns sharply and bounces, taking Guptill by surprise, he's hit near the glove as he tries to defend, the ball rolls towards midwicket
dabbed to short third for a single by Ryder
Guptill's troubles in the middle are over, he gets on one knee and looks to swing that over long-on, can only hit it as far as Albie Morkel, Botha strikes in his first over
defended off the front foot towards point
the third umpire is called for after a direct hit from Duminy at short fine, Taylor had made his ground though

nearly a run-out, Taylor drives his first ball towards the bowler, who moves quickly across to his right to field, Ryder was way outside the crease and a direct hit from Botha would have ended his stay
something which you don't see often, a misfield from South Africa, it was the substitute fielder Roelof van der Merwe at third man, a simple stop gone awry after Ryder dabbed the ball
Ryder mistimes a flat-batted shot towards mid-on
short ball just outside off, not enough room to get power behind the cut which Taylor attempts
another short ball, this time Taylor hops across and short-arm pulls it towards backward square leg
shortish again, on offstump, Taylor shuffles across and defends towards square leg
back of length ball driven down to long-on for a quick couple
tucked behind square from offstump
low full toss on legstump, Ryder dispatches that to the midwicket boundary, Duminy chases and makes a valiant dive but can't stop that one from reaching the rope
the end of Ryder, flighted delivery dips and the charging Ryder is fooled by that one, checks his shot after seeing he's not near the pitch of the ball, it lobs to mid-off for a simple catch
length ball just outside off, defended by the batsman
and again, Botha completes a fine second over after Styris blocks the final delivery to the off side
no room to work with for Taylor, pushed to cover
again close to the body, looks to play to the leg side, off the pad
again the batsman is struck on the pad, well above the knee roll so there was little chance of being lbw, the ball dribbles towards short third man
keeps pegging away at that leg stump line, batsman backs away and dabs it towards point
full and wide outside off, Taylor flashes at that and misses
back of a length, on middle and leg, defended by the batsman
defended towards midwicket by the batsman
the power of Taylor on display, an overpitched ball is flatbatted down the ground for four to long-on, not much of a back lift in Taylor shot
Taylor move across and plays his favourite stroke, the powerful sweep, the only one with a chance of catching that was lounging in the stands behind square leg, he drops it
drive along the ground towards long-off fr two more, fine over for NZ this
length ball heading for off, Taylor powers it to midwicket, couple of bounces ot the fielder
Styris looks to tap it towards the leg side, can't get any runs for his effort
back of a length and outside off, jabbed towards point
New Zealand's chances are fading now, Taylor is gone to a super Gibbs catch, on middle stump, looks to flick it to midwicket, Gibbs is across to his left to take another low catch
length ball angling into leg, defended back down the pitch
makes room and stabs that one towards backward point for another single
an ugly swipe after making room, Styris can only get that short ball towards mid-on
short and outside off, Hopkins thinks of going for a big pull but opts out of the stroke
NZ need more of this, Styris skips away from leg and carves the ball to sweeper cover for four
streaky but NZ aren't complaining, a thick outside edge takes the ball wide of the keeper and fine of third man for four
fuller and on legstump, tucked towards midwicket for a single
bouncer from Kallis, too high, over Hopkins' head
short of length and outside off, Hopkins is hit on the pads outside off as he looks to play to the leg side, ball goes through to the keeper
shortish and just outside off, Hopkins looks to pull but misses

full and just outside off, hits low on Hopkins' bat and bounces towards the keeper, who has to run forward to collect the ball, batsmen pinch a single as Boucher looks to kick the ball onto the stumps
backs away and punches that length delivery to deep point
Styris making a habit of thick outside edges, this time third man can get across in time

super shot from Hopkins, short ball outside off, Hopkins uppercuts it after making room and gets it over third man for six, NZ need on e of those every over, just like SA did towards the end of their innings
lovely response from Langeveldt, a pinpoint yorker which can only be squeezed towards the off side
another one gone, a short ball outside off, Styris could have put that away anywhere he waned, instead he slogs it to Gibbs at midwicket
short and angling across Oram, who is happy to shoulder arms to that one
a full ball on middle, bottom hand comes off the bat as Hopkins keeps that out, somehow gets it away towards cover
end of Oram, who examines his bat to suggest there might have been an inside-edge after a short of length ball pitching on leg thuds into the pads, that was heading for middle and off
punched to cover to get off the mark
squeezed towards backward point for a single this time
makes room and slams that one on the up through extra cover for four, all along the ground
slow bouncer is too high
another slower ball, on a length and heading for off, defended back to the bowler
Hopkins dances down the track and slams the first ball over sweeper cover for a big six
again backs away, this time he looks to uppercut a short ball over third man as he had two overs ago, can't time it as well as then, can only find Steyn at third man this time
McCullum swings at  length ball outside off, misses
slightly wider outside off, McCullum again looks to slam it out of the ground and misses
another dot ball, a slower ball from Morne gets another swing and a miss
a paddle-sweep from outside off fetches McCullum four runs, and with Morne overstepping, it's free-hit time
short ball, McCullum is waltzing down the track, pulls to midwicket for a single
length ball just outside off, carved towards sweeper cover
just past the offstump as Vettori gets way across and tries to get the ball past short fine leg
this time Vettori skips past leg and swings a full ball towards mid-on, free-hit coming up
a wide yorker, McCullum can't do much with that
looks to slip in a slower ball but is too wide outside off
slower ball, length and on off, chipped towards midwicket, timing isn't great so it lands short of the fielder
swung away to deep backward square leg for a single

lovely bit of keeping from Boucher, it was full and outside off, McCullum shuffled across and looked to get it to finel leg, he misses, the ball bounces just before reaching Boucher who collects it low and to his right
looked like a wide outside off stump, Vettori had backed away a long way
full and on offstump, driven towards mid-off
again it's full and just outside off, driven crisply to long-on, just a single
sticks to the full and outside off formula, punched to mid-on, where Smith moves across to his right to field
a bit more width this time, McCullum slices it over deep backwards point for four
ends the over with a low full toss on off, pounded towards extra cover where a jumping Morne Morkel gets a hand on it, but the power means he can't grab on to that hard chance
length ball on the pads, Vettori flicks it away towards deep square leg for four
Vettori hacks at another one outside off but doesn't connect
full on middle and leg, tucked away towards backward square leg
a brilliant hit from McCullum, a shot his brother would have been proud off, powerfully hit over deep cover, taken nicely by a man in the crowd
a full toss, was looking to hit to the leg side, flies towards point instead
length ball on off, Vettori moves across the stumps and works it to midwicket for a single to keep the margin of defeat to 13 runs
